com.pump.awt.text

Class BlockLetter.Gradient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pump.awt.text.BlockLetter
      • com.pump.awt.text.BlockLetter.Gradient
  • Enclosing class:
    BlockLetter

    public static class BlockLetter.Gradient
extends BlockLetter
    This BlockLetter supports two different types of gradients. This renders the gradient as a series of lines (or polygons) whose fill is a 2-color gradient that can be a function of the angle of the tangent curve of the letter.

    Here is a sample:

        public void paintDepth(java.awt.Graphics2D g,
                       float x,
                       float y)
        Description copied from class: BlockLetter
        Paint the depth ("the 3D part") of this BlockLetter.
        Specified by:
        paintDepth in class BlockLetter
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics to draw to
        x - the x-coordinate indicating where to paint.
        y - the y-coordinate indicating where to paint.

      • getGradientColors

        protected java.awt.Color[] getGradientColors(double theta)
        Return the colors used to color this sheet.

        These colors might be a function of theta.

        This may return 1 color, in which case the sheet will be a solid color. Or this might return 2 colors, in which case the first color will be the color touching the character glyph and the second color will be the color furthest away.

        Parameters:
        theta - the angle (in radians) tangent to the glyph shape.
        Returns:
        the colors used to color this sheet.
